page.title: 08School Lessons
page.content: School starts at 9:00 and we hang our coats up and go straight into class. We then do about 10 minutes reading, whilst our teacher, the headmistress, collects the monies or deals with certain other administrative tasks. Our class has in it the complete junior age range.We work in ability groups.Some may do a kind of maths while others do some English or craft. Sometimes we watch edgicational t.v. programs.At 10:30 we have play till 11:00 then we do some more maths,english and artwork.At 11:45 we pack up and go over to the other class and have assembly.At 12:00 we have our dinner. At 13:00 we come in from play and do some work.
